exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : R eps2 : posreal H : Rabs (x - y) <= eps2 Unable to unify "?M2286 < Rabs ?M2286 \\/ ?M2286 = Rabs ?M2286" with "Rabs (x - y) < eps2".
In environment H0 : forall x : R, x <= Rabs x x, y : R eps2 : posreal H : Rabs (x - y) <= eps2 Unable to unify "?M2338 = 0" with "Rabs (x - y) < eps2".

In environment H2 : forall x : R, x <= Rabs x H1 : forall x : R, Rabs x = 0 -> x = 0 x, y : R eps2 : posreal H : Rabs (x - y) <= eps2 Unable to unify "?M2422 < ?M2423 \\/ ?M2422 = ?M2423" with "Rabs (x - y) < eps2".

In environment H4 : forall r1 r2 : R, (forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> r1 <= r2 + eps) -> r1 <= r2 H3 : forall x : R, x <= Rabs x H0 : forall x : R, Rabs x = 0 -> x = 0 x, y : R eps2 : posreal H : Rabs (x - y) <= eps2 Unable to unify "?M2554 = ?M2555" with "Rabs (x - y) < eps2".

original: intros x y eps H. apply Req_lt_aux. intros eps2. specialize (H eps2). apply RRle_abs. apply Rabs_eq_0. apply le_epsilon. intros eps3 H1. apply Req_lt_aux. intros eps4. specialize (H eps4). apply RRle_abs. apply Rabs_eq_0. apply H. apply H1. apply Rabs_pos_lt. intro H2. apply H2. apply H.
